title: Area 51

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - During the day, select someone to “interrogate”

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- At night, you will share a night chat with the person you are interrogating and everyone you are currently holding
- At the end of the night, if your target has abilities that would not be physically possible for a regular human, your target is held indefinitely. All mentions of that player are removed from the game, they are no longer allowed to vote, speak, or use abilities at any point in the game, unless they are speaking in your night chat. They also do not count towards any active win conditions.
- Your target still is considered alive for all intents and purposes, such as a guardian angel needing to protect them.
- If a player publicly mentions that you are the cause behind the disappearances in the town, and you do not interrogate them tonight, documents will be leaked and all of your prisoners will be set free. You will then die, bypassing any defenses you may have at the time.

fields.name: Attributes (cont.):
fields.value:
- If a player mentions anything about you causing the disappearances and they are interrogated that night, they will be imprisoned regardless of their abilities.
- You cannot be hung, as you have too much government influence

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Hang or imprison all criminals and evildoers
